text: "Till the World Ends" is a 2011 single by Britney Spears. The song is second from her seventh studio album Femme Fatale. The song was released on March 11, 2011. == Kesha and Nicki Minaj remix == A remixed version of "Till the World Ends", featuring pop singer Kesha and rapper Nicki Minaj, was leaked online on April 22, 2011. == Other remixes == A Bollywood version of the song was made by Indian music producer duo Salim and Sulaiman Merchant, and released on DesiHits.com, a website for South Asian music and entertainment news. Michigan band Salem released a slowed-down version of the song, and made a music video. A remix featuring R. Kelly was leaked online on July 4, 2011. ==References== Category:2011 songs Category:Britney Spears songs
title: Till the World Ends
